about_section_top_desc: Are you curious about Vertigo Games?
about_section_1_title: Vertigo Games is a game developer
about_section_1_desc:
Vertigo Games focuses on developing real-time PvP games.

Since its establishment in 2006, the company has developed games such as KwonHo, Black Shot, and War of Zombies. The in-house studio continues to develop and research games that users around the world can enjoy. The company's leading game Blackshot has been in service throughout the global market since its launch in 2007.

We are strengthening our business capabilities by publishing and servicing various games (Dekaron, WarRock, La Tale, UWO) via Papaya Play since 2015. We plan to continue expanding our services with the Papaya Play platform to showcase a diverse online and mobile game lineup satisfying users all over the world.
about_section_2_title: Vertigo Games operates global service platform,Papaya play.
about_section_2_desc: Since 2016, Vertigo Games has been running Papaya Play global service platform, through which 6 game titles are currently operated globally.

game_content_data.title: BlackShot M
game_content_data.features: Physics Engine , Optimized for fast-paced battles on mobile device with clean and easy UI , 4v4 Real-Time PvP Game
game_content_data.desc: Opening a new horizon of Mobile FPS games by merging easy, fast, and intuitive play-style with strategic elements.

game_content_data.title: Blackshot
game_content_data.features: Quick and aggressive game play, tactical skill upgrade system, numerous game modes, character customization
game_content_data.desc: BlackShot, the most successful FPS game of Vertigo Games, was developed in-house. Enjoy the fast pace and strategic gameplay throughout the game. Blackshot is operated via Southeast Asia and Global services through PapayaPlay.

game_content_data.title: Dekaron
game_content_data.features: Various character classes, upgrades, massive PvP battles, instanced dungeons, abundance of in-game customization contents
game_content_data.desc: Dekaron is a MMORPG game with a world view that confronts the darkness (Karon) in Trieste, the continent lighted with two moons, and you can choose 12 classes to create characters. Players who reach a certain level through character development can experience PVP battles with all other users in 'DK Square'. You can experience nurturing pets, strengthening equipment and all other features in MMORPG. Dekaron is now available through PapayaPlay.

game_content_data.title: WarRock
game_content_data.features: 17 game modes spanning over 90 distinct maps, customizable characters / loadouts, a hardcore Clan League and more
game_content_data.desc: War Rock is a game that is different from existing FPS games that can be massively fought using military vehicles. We applied new ballistics that was not familiar with the public in Korea at the time, and made new attempts for in-game reality. On a massive map with Middle Eastern backgrounds, tanks, combat helicopters and jets are available for warfare and immersive hits. War Rock is currently playable via PapayaPlay.

game_content_data.title: La Tale
game_content_data.features: 9 distinct base character classes each with an extensive tree of skills and subclass specialties
game_content_data.desc: La Tale is a casual action MMORPG that is made by side-scrolling, where you can enjoy various actions with simple operations. Choose from over 50 professions and classes to create your own character, join heroes from all around the world, and venture into the magical continent. La Tale can be played through PapayaPlay.

game_content_data.title: Uncharted Waters Online [UWO]
game_content_data.features: Hundreds of game objectives (more than 80 professions and 100 skills) to master, buy / build / customize ships from across the ages, participate in massive PvPsea fights with hundreds of other ships.
game_content_data.desc: Uncharted Waters Online is a MMORPG game in which players can experience Mysterious adventures, trade amongst Europe and East Asia and Naval battle over the sea of 16th~19th century. Players can cultivate their own characters with more than 50 professions and 100 kinds of skills, as well as organize a fleet with other players for a variety of adventures. Changing ocean in reaction to region and time is realistically displayed that makes the players to feel the change of sea levels and wind. Across the inland, River Nile, Pyramids and many other things can be seen. Currently Uncharted Waters Online can be played through PapayaPlay.

game_content_data.title: War Of Zombie
game_content_data.features: Intelligent AI, PVP / PVZ / PVE game modes
game_content_data.desc: War of Zombie, developed in partnership with Vertigo Games and Tencent, is distinguished one from the traditional zombie games. Intelligent AI is applied to various PvE mode and BlackShot's sense of hitting is inherited.

game_content_data.title: KwonHo
game_content_data.desc: KwonHo is a real-time online 3D fighting game developed by Vertigo Games. It was developed in 2006 as a differentiated online arcade fighting game that combines character growth systems, multiplication of growth, and unique game elements that were not available in the existing online fighting game genre. Inside the game, you can experience the battle using classic martial arts movements such as Bajiquan, Tai Chi, Taekwondo, and Judo, and also experience the modern fighting skills of Muay Thai and hybrid martial arts.

khw_martial_data.title: Taekwondo
khw_martial_data.desc:
Characteristic fast kicks features.
Skills are simple, fast to use and easy for beginners.
The average damage is huge, conversion into a master (Geum Gang Seo Gi) and advanced attack skills are possible after skill improvement.

khw_martial_data.title: Muay Thai
khw_martial_data.desc:
Specialized in a powerful punch combinations and knee kicks.
Possesses powerful punches, elbow, knee kick combination, and low level of difficulty in skill use.
It is required to consider the distance between targets as it is the mid-, close-distance combat showing the short proximity of attack.

khw_martial_data.title: Tai Chi
khw_martial_data.desc:
A character suitable for a player who wants a psychological warfare rather than a quick combat.
Fights are mostly done with a counterattack, the consecutive skills and the close range fighting skills are appropriately blended but have low attack power.
It shows an effective counterattack using a target's timing.

khw_martial_data.title: Bājíquán
khw_martial_data.desc:
It is a character specialized in close combat, so it requires accurate timing and skill inputs.
The play shows high level of difficulty with close combat skills and gaps right after the hits.
It exhibits the great sense of striking causing a deadly damage on a target if hit on the exact spot.

khw_martial_data.title: Judo
khw_martial_data.desc:
It can be used skillfully only when you get into the heads of your opponent with careful timing.
Specialized in grappling techniques, though it is not deadly, consecutive attacks on weak spots is possible.
It is the character with advanced techniques that has lower hitting height and short attack distance, so you have to understand the inner state of mind of your target to attack the weak spots.
